ActCanada-Nova Scotia Offshore Petroleum Resources Accord Implementation Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Canada — Nova Scotia Offshore Marine Installations and Structures Occupational Health and Safety Transitional Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the CANADA- NOVA SCOTIA OFFSHORE MARINE INSTALLATIONS ANDS STRUCTURES OCCUPATIONAL HEALTH AND SAFETY TRANSITIONAL REGULATIONS in order to reduce unnecessary burden while maintaining and equivalent level of protection of employee health and safety.
